"Never trust a Halfbreed"

-----Original Message-----
From: Roop Dirump [SMTP:roop@...]
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 3:13 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Biographies

From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>

We are bards, and so I thought we'd all have, of course, the most creative
bios people can read when they click us. Since most of us will never meet
each other in real life (er wait a second) or Everquest, I was wondering
what everyone's Bios say? Might be interesting. I'll start us off with my
bio, which reads: dddd;

Roop
